com.cubeia.firebase.api.mtt.seating
Class TournamentSeating

java.lang.Object
  com.cubeia.firebase.api.mtt.seating.TournamentSeating
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TournamentSeating
extends Object
implements Serializable

Holds the seating of players in a tournament.

public TableSeating getTableSeating(Integer tableId)

addPlayerToTable

public void addPlayerToTable(int playerId,
                             int tableId,
                             int seat)
Adds a player to a table. If the destination table does not exist, a new entry will be created.

Parameters:
playerId -
tableId -
seat -

getAllPlayers

public Set<Integer> getAllPlayers()
Gets a Set of the playerIds of all players in this seating. The Set is defensively created, so modifying the Set has no effect on the seating.

Returns:
A Set of playerIds of all players in this seating.

getAllTables

public Set<Integer> getAllTables()
Returns all tables registered with this tournament seating.

Returns:
all tables

hasOrphans

public boolean hasOrphans()
Returns true if the seating has orphan(s). An orphan is a single player on some table playing with himself.

Returns:
true if this seating contains one or more orphans.

public int hashCode()

hashCode in class Object

removePlayer

public boolean removePlayer(int playerId)
Removes a player from the table he is seated at.

Parameters:
playerId -
Returns:
true if the player was removed, false otherwise, meaning the player was not found

removeTable

public void removeTable(int tableId)
Removes a table from the seating. If the table does not exist in the seating map, no action is taken.

Parameters:
tableId -
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the table is not empty

getTableByPlayer

public Integer getTableByPlayer(int playerId)
Gets the tableId where the given player is seated.

Parameters:
playerId -
Returns:
the tableId, or null if the player is not seated at any table

removeTables

public void removeTables(Collection<Integer> tables)
Removes tables from the seating map. If one or more tables do not exist in the seating map, the tables are ignored.

Parameters:
tables -
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if any of the tables are not empty. In this case, no tables at all will be removed.
